price: 3. Kaadu Yallal kelitaay, isi caagiida inkih Yallal kelis, Yalli dacayrih koo duudahak.
arabic: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: watawakkal ʿalā al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
